
Para a frase do professor
analise de frequencia da entrada:

{'P': 0.004830917874396135, 'o': 0.0821256038647343, 't': 0.05314009661835749, 'c': 0.05314009661835749, 'n': 0.057971014492753624, 'h': 0.033816425120772944, 'e': 0.12560386473429952, 'i': 0.057971014492753624, 'm': 0.057971014492753624, 's': 0.15458937198067632, 'f': 0.004830917874396135, 'a': 0.14492753623188406, 'y': 0.004830917874396135, 'q': 0.01932367149758454, 'p': 0.01932367149758454, 'r': 0.03864734299516908, 'g': 0.01932367149758454, 'l': 0.00966183574879227, 'M': 0.004830917874396135, 'd': 0.01932367149758454, 'E': 0.004830917874396135, 'b': 0.00966183574879227, 'w': 0.004830917874396135, 'L': 0.004830917874396135, 'D': 0.004830917874396135, 'V': 0.004830917874396135}


analise de frequencia da saida vernam:

{'1': 0.01646090534979424, 'R': 0.024691358024691357, 'X': 0.0205761316872428, 'v': 0.024691358024691357, 'C': 0.0205761316872428, 'G': 0.024691358024691357, 'i': 0.0205761316872428, 'f': 0.0205761316872428, 'c': 0.024691358024691357, 'J': 0.0205761316872428, 'a': 0.00823045267489712, 'Z': 0.0205761316872428, 'Y': 0.012345679012345678, 'n': 0.0205761316872428, 'q': 0.02880658436213992, 'D': 0.00823045267489712, 'W': 0.0205761316872428, 'r': 0.024691358024691357, 'K': 0.024691358024691357, 'm': 0.0205761316872428, 'E': 0.01646090534979424, 'P': 0.012345679012345678, 'd': 0.01646090534979424, 'N': 0.012345679012345678, '5': 0.012345679012345678, 'S': 0.00823045267489712, '2': 0.024691358024691357, 'z': 0.00411522633744856, 'V': 0.01646090534979424, 'B': 0.012345679012345678, 'Q': 0.01646090534979424, 'A': 0.024691358024691357, 'w': 0.01646090534979424, '7': 0.012345679012345678, 'x': 0.0205761316872428, 'u': 0.0205761316872428, '6': 0.024691358024691357, 'I': 0.012345679012345678, '0': 0.00823045267489712, 'M': 0.012345679012345678, 's': 0.02880658436213992, 'b': 0.01646090534979424, 'e': 0.012345679012345678, 'o': 0.012345679012345678, '8': 0.0205761316872428, 'k': 0.0205761316872428, 'O': 0.012345679012345678, 'U': 0.012345679012345678, 'T': 0.00823045267489712, 'p': 0.01646090534979424, 'g': 0.00823045267489712, 'L': 0.012345679012345678, 'y': 0.024691358024691357, '3': 0.00823045267489712, 'H': 0.024691358024691357, '4': 0.01646090534979424, 't': 0.012345679012345678, 'h': 0.00823045267489712, 'j': 0.00411522633744856, 'l': 0.00411522633744856, '9': 0.00411522633744856}

Como será feita a geração da chave?
    A geração de chaves foi feita utilizando a biblioteca pycrypto para python.
    Atraves da função Crypto.Random.get_random_bytes(n) é possivel gerar bytes verdadeiramente randomicos para a geração das chaves.

O algoritmo de Vernam é vulnerável à análise de frequências?
    Se não existe previsibilidade na geração das chaves é impossivel descobrir o conteudo da mensagem com analise de frequencias.
